basics.name: Kobus van der Merwe
basics.label: Principal ML & Data Platform Engineer
basics.summary: Principal ML & Data Platform Engineer with 25+ years building production-grade data platforms, MLOps pipelines, and high-availability systems across banking, automotive, and consulting. Known for shipping reliable infra (Kubernetes/OpenShift), scalable data & ML stacks (Python/C#/Kafka/SQL/Neo4j), and fraud & analytics solutions that bridge research and operations.

work.name: PwC South Africa
work.summary: Designing a bespoke data modelling platform enabling actuarial and data-science workloads end-to-end (ingest → processing → storage) with reliability and scale.
highlights: Architected ingestion, processing and storage layers for actuarial analytics (Python, SQL, Kubernetes/OpenShift, DevOps).
Established platform guardrails for performance, reproducibility and compliance.
Accelerated model delivery by standardising pipelines and environments.

work.name: BMW IT Hub South Africa
work.summary: SRE/DevOps for Plant Connectivity—a real-time automotive data platform—focusing on uptime, observability, and automated delivery.
highlights: Hardened runtime and deploy paths with Kubernetes, Docker and CI/CD to improve reliability of high-volume data flows.
Implemented actionable observability to shorten detect→diagnose cycles for production incidents.
Codified infra as code and release workflows to reduce change risk.

work.name: Vision Bank
work.summary: Led design of the enterprise data platform inside the Data & Advanced Analytics team.
highlights: Built ingestion & streaming foundations with schema and lineage management (Python, SQL, Kafka).
Enabled production ML + reporting by unifying operational and warehouse data paths.
Set MLOps practices for reliable deployment and monitoring of models.

work.name: Vision Bank
work.summary: Chapter Lead in a startup digital bank, overseeing 60+ software and test engineers across multiple tribes.
highlights: Raised engineering standards across SDLC; advanced test automation and CI/CD.
Balanced people leadership with technology direction (C#, Python, DevOps).
Improved delivery velocity by streamlining ways-of-working and tooling.

work.name: Fractal Labs
work.summary: Technology strategy and delivery for a data analytics provider (continuation of MyBucks post-restructure).
highlights: Shipped analytics & fraud solutions across SQL/NoSQL and ML stacks (MS SQL, MongoDB, Neo4j, Python, C#, XGBoost, CUDA).
Ran HA deployments on Kubernetes/OpenShift with strong DevOps/MLOps.
Delivered client-facing platforms and integrations at production scale.

Delivered cross-platform integrations across 25+ projects.
